Plot PCR Data

Source: R/plot_pcr.R
plot_pcr.Rd

This function plots the PCR fluorescence data and the cycle threshold.

Usage

plot_pcr(pcr_data, Ct)

Arguments

pcr_data

A data frame with PCR data (as output from simulate_pcr).

Ct

The cycle threshold value (as output from simulate_pcr).
